text: Swiggy is an Indian online food delivery company. It was started in 2014 in Bengaluru, Karnataka. Swiggy operates in over 580 cities across India. It delivers food from restaurants and groceries through its Instamart service. It also provides a package delivery service called Swiggy Genie. Swiggy was created by Sriharsha Majety, Nandan Reddy, and Rahul Jaimini. The company began as a courier service called Bundl in 2011, but it shifted to food delivery in 2014. It quickly grew to become one of the largest food delivery platforms in India. In 2020, Swiggy launched Instamart to deliver groceries. During the COVID-19 pandemic, it also started alcohol delivery in some states. In 2024, Swiggy became a public company and listed its shares on the stock market. ==References== Category:Companies of India Category:2014 establishments Category:Food companies Category:Technology companies
title: Swiggy
